resource.name: TIF Data
resource.description: This dataset contains information on all Tax Increment Finance (TIF) parcels. Includes the TIF parcel number, the billable parcel number, project name and number, type of TIF, year the TIF begins/ends and TIF tax calculation amounts.

domain_metadata.value: Assessment and Project Table from Tyler Technology Enterprise and Tax
Daily

resource.name: 2018-2020 Residential Median Sales (School District)
resource.description: This dataset shows the median sales by school district.

domain_metadata.value: Sales Table from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Every 3 years (Triennial and Reappraisal Updates)

resource.name: CRA and EZ Information
resource.description: The dataset shows parcels receiving a tax abatement via a Community Reinvestment Area (CRA) or part of an Enterprise Zone (EZ).  Data includes the type of tax abatement, when the abatement began, when the abatement ends, how long the abatement lasts, the authority that approved the abatement, and the appraised value (land, building, and total) being abated.

domain_metadata.value: Legal and Assessment Tables from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Daily

resource.name: Median Property Values 2010-2020
resource.description: This dataset shows median property value for all classes of property and CAUV for all of Clermont County.

domain_metadata.value: Value Table from Tyler Technologies Enterprise and Tax
As needed

resource.name: Acres By Township
resource.description: This dataset shows how many acres are in each township in Clermont County. This Dataset includes the name of the township and how many GIS calculated acres are in each township in Clermont County.

domain_metadata.value: Clermont County Auditor's GIS Database
As needed

resource.name: AC - Parcels
resource.description: The dataset shows information about dwellings, commercial structures, and sales for each parcel in Clermont County.

domain_metadata.value: Sales, Dwelling, Commercial and Assessment Tables from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Daily

resource.name: 2018-2020 Median Sales Map Data
resource.description: This dataset contains information on median sale price for calendar years 2018 through 2020 by Township. Data that is included is the Township name, median sale price for years 2018 through 2020, and mapping information for the boundaries of the townships.

domain_metadata.value: Sales Table from Tyler Technology Enterprise and Tax and ESRI
As needed for Triennial and Reappraisal updates

resource.name: SALES
resource.description: This dataset contains information on all sales from January 1, 2016 to Current. The dataset includes sale date, sale price, type of sale, sale validity, owner information, class, land use code (LUC),  district and school district information.

domain_metadata.value: Sale and Assessment Tables from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Daily

resource.name: Tax Program Credits
resource.description: This dataset contains information about Homestead and Owner Occupancy Credits. Including if a parcel is receiving the Homestead and/or Owner Occupancy credit, how much is being saved in the programs, value information, and if it was added or removed from Homestead and/or Owner Occupancy.
columns_description: Was the property removed from the Owner-Occupancy Program?
Was the property added to the Owner-Occupancy program this year?
Number of Exemptions from the Owner Occupancy Program
Total Exemptions from the Owner Occupancy Program
Number of Exemptions from the Homestead Program
Number of Exemptions from the Homestead Program
Was the property Grandfathered into the Homestead Program?
Date added to the Homestead Program
In the Homestead Program last year?
In the Owner-Occupancy Program last year?

domain_metadata.value: Adjustment Table from Tyler Technology Enterprise and Tax
Daily

resource.name: TIF Tax Distribution
resource.description: The dataset shows tax dollars that are being re-directed away from the entity being shown. Dataset includes tax years, project number and name, entity that created the TIF, levy/entity being affected by re-directed dollars and amounts.

domain_metadata.value: Daily

resource.name: Delinquent Tax Values
resource.description: This dataset shows all of the prior year delinquent tax amounts in Clermont County.  The Dataset includes owner information, delinquent tax amount, certified delinquent year and  total appraised and assessed value of the property.

domain_metadata.value: Legal, Owner, and Assessment Tables from Tyler Technologies Enterprise and Tax
Daily

resource.name: 2020 Reappraisal Median Property Values
resource.description: 2020 Reappraisal Median Appraised Property Values for all classes (Agriculture, Commercial, Industrial, and Residential) and for all Townships, Villages and Municipalities.

domain_metadata.value: Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment & Tax Dwelling Information
Every 3 years (Triennial and Reappraisal Updates)

resource.name: All Parcel Values
resource.description: This dataset shows values from tax year 2010 to current. Includes the 100% appraised and  35% assessed values of land, building and total for each parcel. Also shows if a parcel is receiving the homestead reduction, owner occupancy credit and if part of a Tax Increment Finance (TIF) district.

domain_metadata.value: Legal and Assessment Tables provided by Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Daily

resource.name: 2018-2020 Median Sale Price by Townships
resource.description: This dataset contains information of median sale prices for 2018 through 2020 by Townships. Data includes the township name and the 2018, 2019, and 2020 median sale price.

domain_metadata.value: Sales table from Tyler Technology Enterprise and Tax
As needed for Triennial and Reappraisal updates

resource.name: Acres By School District
resource.description: This dataset shows how many acres are in each school district in Clermont County. This Dataset includes the name of the school district and how many GIS calculated acres are in each School District in Clermont County.

domain_metadata.value: ESRI
As needed

resource.name: 2021 Real Estate Projected Tax Revenue
resource.description: This Dataset shows the projected real estate revenue by entity based on initial tax calculations.

domain_metadata.value: The data is provided tax abstract calculation tables from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax.
Annually

resource.name: Appeals
resource.description: This dataset shows everything related to all value appeals including Board of Revisions (BOR), COVID Filings, and Informal appeals.

domain_metadata.value: Hearing and Tracking Table from Tyler Technologies Enterprise Assessment and Tax
Daily

resource.name: 2020 Reappraisal Value Changes
resource.description: This dataset contains information on the value changes by township for the Reappraisal. Includes the mapping data, township name, 2019 appraised value, 2020 appraised value, total change and the percentage change between the two years (2019 and 2020)

domain_metadata.value: Value table from Tyler Technology Enterprise and Tax and ESRI
Every three years for the Triennial and Reappraisal updates

resource.name: 2018-2020 Residential Sales (Township)
resource.description: Residential sales from Calendar Year 2018, 2019 and 2020

domain_metadata.value: Tyler Technology Enterprise Assessment & Tax Sales Table
As needed for the Triennial and Reappraisal

resource.name: 2021 Real Estate 1st Half Tax Distribution
resource.description: The dataset shows all real estate taxes collected and distributed to each entity for the 1st half of the 2021 Tax Year.
